text: Va ʙa suji [mardumi] Madjan ʙarodaras Suajʙro [firistodem]. U guft: «Ej qavmi man, Alloh taoloro ʙiparasted, ki cuz U ma'ʙud [-i ʙarhaq] nadored. Jaqinan, az [suji] Parvardigoraton ʙaroi sumo daleli ravsan omadaast, pas, [haqqi] pajmona va tarozuro komil [-u durust] ado kuned va ʙa mardum acnosasonro kam nadihed va dar zamin pas az islohas fasod nakuned. Agar imon dored, in ʙaroi sumo ʙehtar ast
